Reviews.Title: crayola digital camera
Reviews.Author: Donna L. Slowik
Reviews.Content: easy to use and the graphic software is very easy to use. the battery chamber does require the use of a very small phillips screwdriver.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money!
Reviews.Author: ajean19
Reviews.Content: My husband and I gave this camera to our daughter for her 4th birthday.  We wanted one that would be durable but still be able to take better pictures and have more function than the typical kids cameras.  She loves taking pictures with this!  It is her favorite toy.  It has been very durable.  She is able to see the picture that she has taken, be able to delete photos, and enjoy it.  She has even dropped it once and it still has been fine.  We have not used the editing software yet.  I'm sure it works great.  A great camera for a kid!!  I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: cynthia ashby "cynthia ashby"
Reviews.Content: Works really well easy handle to carry, granddaughter is three and loves it.  Pictures are great I would suggest it

Reviews.Title: Crayola Digi camera
Reviews.Author: Mrs. M
Reviews.Content: great product my daughter loves it!!! she uses it everyday and loves taking pics somuch she wants to be a photographer

ProductInfo.Name: Crayola 2.1 Mp Digital Camera with Preview Screen & Color Genie Photo Editing Software!
